name: Anaheim
shortDescription: A vibrant city known for its world-famous theme parks, sports venues, and thriving entertainment and hospitality industry.
fullDescription: Anaheim is the heart of Orange County‚Äôs entertainment and tourism scene, home to Disneyland Resort, Angel Stadium, and the Honda Center. The city blends family fun with a strong economy, offering diverse neighborhoods, cultural events, and convenient access to beaches and major freeways. Anaheim appeals to residents and visitors alike with its mix of urban energy and Southern California charm.
heroImageAlt: Downtown Anaheim skyline with Disneyland fireworks

neighborhoods.name: Fullerton
neighborhoods.description: College town with historic downtown, arts scene, and California State University, Fullerton.
neighborhoods.imageAlt: Historic downtown Fullerton with vibrant street life

neighborhoods.name: Garden Grove
neighborhoods.description: Diverse community known for the annual Strawberry Festival and rich cultural heritage.
neighborhoods.imageAlt: Downtown Garden Grove with cultural festival

neighborhoods.name: Orange
neighborhoods.description: Historic Old Town with antique shops, restaurants, and community events.

neighborhoods.name: Placentia
neighborhoods.description: Small suburban city with parks, family-oriented events, and a quaint downtown.

highlights.title: Disneyland Resort
highlights.description: World-famous theme park attracting millions of visitors yearly with rides, entertainment, and events.
highlights.bgImageAlt: Disneyland castle lit up at night

highlights.title: Angel Stadium
highlights.description: Home to the Los Angeles Angels MLB team and host of concerts and major events.
highlights.bgImageAlt: Angel Stadium filled with fans during a game

highlights.title: Honda Center
highlights.description: Indoor arena hosting NHL games, concerts, and family shows.
highlights.bgImageAlt: Honda Center arena exterior at dusk

highlights.title: Anaheim Packing District
highlights.description: Trendy food hall and farmers market located in a historic citrus packing house.
highlights.bgImageAlt: Food stalls inside Anaheim Packing District

faqs.question: What makes Anaheim a popular tourist destination?
faqs.answer: Disneyland Resort, sports venues, and numerous entertainment options draw millions each year.

faqs.question: How family-friendly is Anaheim?
faqs.answer: With theme parks, parks, and community events, Anaheim offers many activities suitable for families.

faqs.question: What is the housing market like in Anaheim?
faqs.answer: Median home prices are around $750K, with a mix of historic neighborhoods and new developments.

faqs.question: How accessible is Anaheim to beaches and freeways?
faqs.answer: Anaheim is approximately 15-20 miles from coastal beaches and is well-connected via major freeways like the 5 and 91.
